column2: Smack your foe with a cattle prod.
Capture the essence of a ghost that is below 50%% health and send it to Jenk's repository.
Leaping attack to knock down foes.
Spin attack to knock back foes.
Smack your foe with the tool. The tool may break.
Use this Iron Legion device to clean and weaponize tar off of your target.
Use weaponized tar to torch your target.
Knockback your foe with the butt of your rifle. Be careful not to break it.
Knock back foes and projectiles with a hot air blast.
Capture ice cores from elementals with health below 50%%
Knock back inactive foes with a kick.
Immobilize your foes with a flurry of strikes. Effect increases with adrenaline level.
Fires an experimental and highly volatile bullet at the target.
Knockback your foe with the butt of your rifle.
Bleed a foe with a strike from your rusty sword.
Swing and hit multiple foes with your rusty greatsword.
Run as fast as you can, gain health.
Force yourself out of pig form. This might hurt.
Smell the air to catch the aroma of truffles.
Take a bite of the truffle.
You could pry open a cage door with this bar.
Pour water to rejuvinate turret pods, or cleanse swamp sickness.
Generate a power surge at the target location bringing down a massive bolt of lightning.
Open your bottle and drink it down...if you dare.
Throw your bottle. Be careful not to hit anybody.
Dump your water on someone to wake them up (and make them smell better).
Hold to emit a stream of debilitating noise from the end of the gun. Watch out that it does not overheat!
Return this to Pastkeeper Saballa and see if it jogs her memory.
Fire a concoction of Hylek explosives at your current target.
Fire a concoction of Hylek explosives at the ground.
Apply repellent to nearby creatures that have been infested by spiders.
Plant a red mortar turret seed.
Smack your foe with a stump, though the stump may break.
Break your stump on your foe's face.
The Michotl hylek derived a mild sedative that they use to stun dragonflies without killing them.
A blast of energy tuned to negate the effects of chaos magic.
Leap up and kick your target, dazing them.
Release a cloud of hylek poison to damage foes, can also gas dragonflies out of their nests.
Fire a barrage of unpoisoned darts. These will not stun dragonflies, only kill them.
Throw the spikeroot fruit and knock down a foe.
Throw the repellent, damaging pests and cleansing infected hounds.
Launches water at friendly Hylek to hydrate them.
Has 'Do Not Press' written on it.
Shadowstep to your foe and steal from them.
Throw a vapor blade that does double damage to moving foes.
Discharge energy to weaken a golem.
Plant a purple mine turret seed.
Plant a yellow mine turret seed.
Plants a turret that draws agro, when things attack it they take damage. Just sits there until it is destroyed.
Plant a brown thorny turret seed.
Plants a turret that fires needles in all directions
Plant a red mortar turret seed.
Plants a mortar that fires a frozen ball as a projectile at a target, slowing them.
Plant a blue mortar turret seed.
Plants a mortar that fires a healing seed at a nearby friendly target, giving them back health.
Plant a yellow mortar turret seed.
Fire a volley of shots at your foe.
Hold and release to shoot your foe and make them vulnerable. Hold longer for more damage.
Aim downwards and blast off the ground to fly at a foe.
Use the Priory artifact-scanning gun to find excavation sites in the ruins, then mark the spots for Priory workers.
Leap at your foe. Inflicts blindness and heals you for each foe hit.
Spin in place and swing your greatsword while hurling powerful projectiles.
Create a shield to block the next three attacks. If the shield is not destroyed, it explodes and damages nearby foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Grant aegis and swiftness to up to five nearby allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Draw conditions from nearby allies to yourself. Gain multiple boons for a short duration.
Breathe magical flames that damage foes and cure conditions on allies. Inflicts burning on the final attack.
Create a dome around you that pushes foes back and absorbs projectiles.
The Priory is grateful for your assistance.

Signet Passive: Improved Power
Signet Active: Knock down and damage your foe.
<c=@abilitytype>Consecration.</c> Protect the targeted area with a wall of mystic power that reflects projectiles.
Draw a symbol on the ground that heals allies and damages foes.
Fire a slow-moving orb at your foe.
Immobilize and make your foe vulnerable with ethereal chains.
A huge sea creature called a karka" has attacked Lion's Arch."
Set yourself alight, periodically burning up to three nearby foes. The final pulse applies additional burning.
Put some strum back into your step with this beautiful instrument.
Hit your foe with a final strike and heal nearby allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Smash a mystic symbol onto the ground that damages foes and regenerates allies.
You are ready to confront the ancient karka on its island home.
You are ready to begin the final attack on the ancient karka.
Infuse your foe with the light of judgment, inflicting damage each interval if they are initially struck.

This fun inventory item spawns a lab table for everyone to experiment with and causes everything you see to appear bobbleheaded.
This item has infinite uses.

Virtue: Regenerates health.
Activate: Heal yourself and nearby allies.
Fire a bolt that damages foes.
Launch your foe with a powerful smash.
You drove off the ancient karka.
<c=@abilitytype>Consecration.</c> Form a protective healing shelter for allies. Block foes and their missiles from entering.
You cannot use skills while in a sanctuary.
Attack with a final, powerful strike that applies might for each foe you strike.
Detonate the orb to heal nearby allies and grant them light aura. Orb of Light takes longer to recharge.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Sear a mystic symbol into the target area, damaging foes and granting swiftness to allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Ward.</c> Create a line in front of you that foes cannot cross.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Pierce the ground with a mystic symbol that damages foes while granting retaliation to allies.
Throw blades at your foes, causing damage over time. Bound foes can be pulled to you. The effect ends when a foe moves out of range.
Focus a wrathful light ray on your foe.

Signet Passive: Grants you increased condition damage.
Signet Active: Immobilize your target.
<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Grant protection and regeneration to allies.
<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Grant stability to yourself and allies.
You've reported to Inspector Kiel and are now ready to confront Subdirector Blingg.

Signet Passive: Improves concentration.
Signet Active: Revive a nearby downed ally.
<c=@abilitytype>Meditation.</c> Teleport to your target and burn nearby foes.
You've confronted Blingg and are ready to take this matter to Subdirector Noll.
Box[pl:Boxes"] of Valkyrie Reinforced Scale Armor"
<c=@abilitytype>Consecration.</c> Create a ring of fire that burns foes when it first forms and again whenever foes cross it. Allies inside the ring lose conditions every pulse.
<c=@abilitytype>Consecration.</c> Consecrate the target area, granting stability to allies inside.
Throw a spear that makes your foe vulnerable, dealing bonus damage at closer range.
Strike foes in front of you with a storm of jabs.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Create a spear wall in front of you that damages foes that remain in its area.
Throw a spear and pull your foe to you, burning them.
Damage nearby foes with a mighty ground slam.
<c=@abilitytype>Ward.</c> Create a ring around you that foes cannot cross. Trapped foes cannot exit the ring while it is active.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Blue spectrum.
Box[pl:Boxes"] of Knight's Reinforced Scale Armor"
Grant protection and regeneration to allies in a cone.
Pacify foes, dazing them for three seconds.
Fully heal up to five nearby allies.
Heal allies in the target area.
<c=@abilitytype>Tome.</c> Summon an ancient tome that grants you powerful support spells.
Fire a sundering ball of light that damages foes.

Sink your foe with the weight of justice, inflicting damage continuously.
Damage ceases if the stun is broken.
Release an orb of cleansing light that cures conditions on allies it passes through and detonates on enemies struck. Burns foes and cures conditions on allies within the blast radius.
<c=@abilitytype>Symbol.</c> Create a pillar of light that does damage every second at your foe's location.
Create a bubble that blocks enemy missiles and grants retaliation to allies.
Escape toward the surface and heal.
Damage foes in an area that grows larger.
Burn foes in the target area.
Send out a projectile that makes foes crippled and weak.
Send out a cone that grants might and swiftness and to allies.
Grant fury and quickness to all nearby allies.
Knock down and damage nearby foes with a massive blast.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Brown spectrum.

This way you don't have to touch...them."
—Explorer Erikk"
Detonate the dome to heal nearby allies.
Beseech Dwayna to restore your health.
Beseech Kormir to remove 3 conditions from you.
Pray to Lyssa, granting a random boon to yourself and a random condition to target foe.
Summon two Hounds of Balthazar to fight at your side.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Gray spectrum.
Become a Reaper of Grenth, chilling and poisoning nearby foes.
Transformed into an Avatar of Melandru
Strike a nearby foe with a massive swipe.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Green spectrum.
Entangle all nearby foes with binding roots, preventing them from moving until the roots have been destroyed.
Remove the Avatar of Melandru, returning to your normal form.
Transform into an Avatar of Melandru.
Hold down to power up an attack that does increased damage from behind.
You confronted Noll and are now ready to take this matter up with Canach.
Strike your target 3 times, applying bleed on each hit.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Orange spectrum.
You confronted Canach and discovered his secret activities on the Consortium island.
Celebrate epic deeds with a noble toast and a fancy drink.
Bowing is the fancy way to say hello.
Channel a beam of energy that damages and confuses your foe.
Create a magical storm at the target location that applies random conditions to foes and boons to allies. The first strike of the storm dazes foes.
<c=@abilitytype>Chain.</c> Slash your foe to make them vulnerable.
<c=@abilitytype>Chain.</c> Gash your foe to make them vulnerable.
Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Purple spectrum.
Double-click to gain a super secret spy kit full of secrets and mysteries.
<c=@abilitytype>Clone.</c> Summon an illusion that leaps at your target, crippling them. After the initial leap, the clone will execute the Mind Slash sword chain.
Heal yourself. Gain additional health for each active clone.
<c=@abilitytype>Transform.</c> Turn your foe into a moa bird.
<c=@abilitytype>Manipulation.</c> Send conditions you have to your foe and steal their boons. Successfully hitting your target inflicts slow on them while granting you quickness.
<c=@abilitytype>Glamour.</c> Create a wall that grants stealth to you and your allies.
Use shadowy magic to leap at your foe, blinding them and stealthing you.
Shoot your foe. Chance to blind on crit.
Create an explosion of magical energy, confusing your foe.
<c=@abilitytype>Clone.</c> Gain stealth and summon an illusion to attack your foe.
